ui_control.name: application_compliance
ui_control.label: Is this application governed by regulatory system such as PCI-DSS, HIPAA or equivalent in your industry?

ui_control.name: application_data_compliance
ui_control.label: Does this application use any sensitive data like credit card information etc.?

ui_control.name: application_usage_pattern
ui_control.label: What is the application usages pattern (Office hours, 24X7, seasonal Traffic, year/month end event)? Please indicate peaks, if any.

ui_control.name: application_performance_sla
ui_control.label: Do we have performance SLA for this application?

ui_control.name: application_dr
ui_control.label: What is current DR setup? Is it active/Active or active/Passive and what is the RTO/RPO requirement?

ui_control.name: application_maintenance_window
ui_control.label: Is there any approved maintenance window for offline deployment and please include current release frequency?

ui_control.name: application_current_challenge
ui_control.label: Do you have any major challenge in current application that you would like to address during this migration? For example, peak performance requirements, IOPS etc.

ui_control.name: application_interface
ui_control.label: Please provide list and count of all interfacing applications (Ingress and Egress Interfaces)
